resources.string: Ready to become the best rider? We will explain you how.
In your computer or Smart TV open http://horserider.obturecode.com with your browser.
Once here, when you tap on Gee Up! write your name to see your horse on the big screen.
Urge on your horse by moving your phone to be faster than your friends.
You can play against up to three more friends in this exciting race through the desert. Are you ready?
Oops… something went wrong. Please try again.
It seems the game has already started. You better be faster next time!
Waiting for your game to start…
When all players are ready, press Start.
La partida se ha acabado. pulsa aceptar para volver atr√°s.
